name: Poissorium
description:
Welcome to the World of Poissorium. Embark on a peaceful journey with bubulle a courageous fish through the rivers and the different biomes you will encounter as you try to get our favorite fish back home at the root of all life in the ocean.

Envoyer un message à @AznADoll

Poissorium was made for the Global game Jam 2023 in Strasbourg (France) and won the jury's favorite prize. 

3D Artists : 

  • Oriane Braun
  • Florian Pioche
  • Marie Klein-North
  • Corentin Chemineau

Sound / music : 

  • Maxime Rumpler

Dev :

  • Paul Strub
